mapper.insert:
select max(bno)+1 bno from article
insert into article (bno, title, category, content, writer, url) values(#{bno}, #{title}, #{category}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{url})
mapper.select: select * from article where bno > 0 order by bno desc
mapper.update: update article set viewcnt = viewcnt+1 where bno = #{bno}
